properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
164 FOOT M/V BOURBON RHODE, 14 PERSONS ON BOARD,
SUNK IN 16-05N 040-02W AT 261200Z SEP. THREE PERSONS RECOVERED. TWO PERSONS IN WATER. NINE PERSONS REMAIN MISSING AND BELIEVED TO BE IN A LIFERAFT. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
